backend/main.mo: Defines core data types, maps, and authorization for chapters, questions, users, and test results with contributor unlock logic and comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests related to publishing the live deployment.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all frontend files covering hooks, components, pages, and documentation.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: High-level frontend architecture description outlining structure, routing, and design approach.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark mode palettes for the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/index.ts: Type definition file describing the UserStats shape with bigint fields.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring routes, authentication state, profile setup flow, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGateC: Empty or placeholder file for the admin gate component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form card for new users to submit their display name using validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/contributor/Cont: UI card that handles contributor password submission, validates login/actor readiness, and triggers unlockContributor mutation with error and loading states.
frontend/src/components/errors/GlobalErr: React error boundary that catches unhandled errors and displays GlobalErrorScreen.
Full-page error UI showing error details with buttons to reload or return home.
Main layout providing header, navigation, responsive drawer, and footer, adapting links based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePag: Wrapper component applying responsive padding and optional max-width constraints.
frontend/src/config/liveDeployment.ts: Defines live deployment name and functions to validate and warn about invalid configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for checking contributor access and unlocking contributor mode with cache updates on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePracticeTimer.ts: A timer hook providing elapsed time tracking with start, stop, reset, and computed time values.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, chapters, questions, stats, and related data via the canister actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark mode, including colors and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentityProvider and React Queryâ€™s QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for future admin features.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterSelectPage.tsx: Displays chapters for a selected subject and navigates users to practice sessions.
frontend/src/pages/ContributorPage.tsx: Provides contributor-only interfaces for managing chapters, questions, and viewing user stats with gated access.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home screen offering navigation to student mode, rankings, and contributor mode with identity/access checks.
frontend/src/pages/PracticePage.tsx: Runs the question practice flow with timers, answer selection, progress tracking, and result submission.
frontend/src/pages/RankingsPage.tsx: Displays leaderboard and user stats with icons, loading state, and accuracy calculation.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows placeholder test results summary and navigation options pending backend result retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectSelectPage.tsx: Provides subject selection cards for Physics, Chemistry, and Biology with navigation to chapter selection.
frontend/src/types/practice.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for practice sessions and local question attempts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended colors, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, architecture, issues, and requirements for the NEET practice app.
